history.proof: intros V H v k x. unfold subst_idx. destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec x k) as [[lt|eq]|lt]. - auto. - auto. - auto.

ctx: intros V H v k x.
exceptions.exn: In environment V : Type H : Var V v, k, x : nat lt : x < k Unable to unify "subst_idx ?M1388 ?M1389 ?M1390 = var ?M1390" with "var x = var (var x)".

ctx: intros V H v k x.
exceptions.exn: In environment V : Type H : Var V v, k, x : nat eq : x = k Unable to unify "subst_idx ?M1388 ?M1389 ?M1390 = ?M1388" with "var v = var v".

ctx: intros V H v k x.
exceptions.exn: In environment V : Type H : Var V v, k, x : nat lt : k < x Unable to unify "subst_idx ?M1388 ?M1389 ?M1390 = var (?M1390 - 1)" with "var (x - 1) = var (var (x - 1))".

original: intros V H v k x. unfold subst_idx. destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec x k) as [[lt|eq]|lt]. - apply subst_idx_miss_1. auto. - apply subst_idx_identity. auto. - apply subst_idx_miss_2. auto.
